title: What are some songs about hate? - Quora

response.answer_text: Fucked With An Anchor by Alestorm. Sounds humorously lighthearted and corny for being so obscene and vitriolic. The verses are about some witch doctor who put a curse on a pirate, as you do, but the chorus is applicable to anyone who's extraordinarily salty. Slaves of Fear by Amon Amarth. It's a song about hatred of organized religion, written about the conversion of Scandinavia to Christianity by a pagan-coded band but perfectly singable, or gnashable and gruntable, by any angry atheist. Your Disposal by Cattle Decapitation. It's about how worthless and despicable humanity is and how we deserve a slow and agonizing extinction because of it. In fact that's most of what they write about.
